start_game_desc: To play on our server you need to download files from Google Drive or install the client through our launcher (recommended). Account registration is done in-game!
server_opening: The server opening will take place {datetime}
reclaunch: (We recommend installing the game via the launcher)
infs:
Classic Gracia Final server with x1 rates.
The server is as close to retail as possible
Multilingual server
Offline trade is free

There is no donation system on the server
Maximum number of windows: 4
Trading zone - MDT
Buffs up to level 24
Teleports are paid


We are against bought clans and parties. The server is adapted for solo players!
The server has DDoS protection!
rginf:
dear players! our server has auto-registration enabled!

to register on the server you must download our client
you can download the Gracia Final client via Google or through our launcher (recommended)
after installing the client launch the game!
in the game enter your desired login and password
if the login is available, the account will be created
we do not recommend using passwords from other projects
minimum account name length is 4 characters, password length is 4 characters

the server has protection against password guessing!
